statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = #value# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = #value# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE InsertTime < #InsertDate# AND FromPC = #FromPC# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE InsertTime > #InsertDate# AND FromPC = #FromPC# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = #value#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE InsertTime < #InsertTime# AND FromPC = #FromPC#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE InsertTime > #InsertTime# AND FromPC = #FromPC#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT * FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE CheckDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# AND FromPC = #FromPC#

SELECT TOP 1 (SELECT SUM(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'MSJY' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pMSJY, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'QXD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qQXD, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'QXD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pQXD, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'LJDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qLJPHDS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'LJDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pLJPHDS, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'KJGTSL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qKJGTSL, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'KJGTSL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pKJGTSL, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'ZWXTSL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qZWXTSL, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'ZWXTSL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pZWXTSL, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'QMDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qQMDS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'QMDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pQMDS, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'SGDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qSGDS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'SGDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pSGDS, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'GSCJCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qGSCJCS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'GSCJCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pGSCJCS, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'YZZLZJCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qYZZLZJCS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'YZZLZJCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pYZZLZJCS, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JPCTCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJPCTSC, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JPCTCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJPCTSC, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'WDCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qWDCS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'WDCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pWDCS, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'NRXCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qNRXCS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'NRXCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pNRXCS FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail
SELECT isnull(SUM (PassSum),0) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE InvoiceCusXOId=#InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId=#ProductId# AND FromPC=#FromPC#

SELECT TOP 1 (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAQXD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCSAQXD, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAQXD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCSAQXD, (SELECT sum(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAGX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCSAGX, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAGX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCSAGX, (SELECT sum(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAPGPCL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCSAPGPCL, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAPGPCL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCSAPGPCL, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAWDCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCSAWDCS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAWDCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCSAWDCS, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAKJGTSL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCSAKJGTSL, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAKJGTSL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCSAKJGTSL, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAGSCJCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCSAGSCJCS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CSAGSCJCS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCSAGSCJCS FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail

SELECT TOP 1 (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENCONSTRUCTION' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENCONSTRUCTION, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENCONSTRUCTION' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENCONSTRUCTION, (SELECT sum(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENQMDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENQMDS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENQMDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENQMDS, (SELECT sum(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENSGDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENSGDS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENSGDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENSGDS, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENLJDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENLJDS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENLJDS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENLJDS, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENZB' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENZB, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENZB' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENZB, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENTSL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENTSL, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENTSL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENTSL, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENBMPZ' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENBMPZ, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENBMPZ' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENBMPZ, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENZSCJ' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENZSCJ, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENZSCJ' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENZSCJ, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENGSCJ' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENGSCJ, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENGSCJ' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENGSCJ, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENJH' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENJH, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENJH' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENJH, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENZX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENZX, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENZX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENZX, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENUVCF' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qCEENUVCF, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'CEENUVCF' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pCEENUVCF FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail

SELECT TOP 1 (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'ASCCSL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qASCCSL, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'ASCCSL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pASCCSL FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail

SELECT TOP 1 (SELECT SUM(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPWG' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISJPWG, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPWG' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISJPWG, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPLJD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISJPLJD, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPLJD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISJPLJD, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPQGD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISJPQGD, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPQGD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISJPQGD, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPSGD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISJPSGD, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPSGD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISJPSGD, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPTGL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISJPTGL, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPTGL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISJPTGL, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPNCCX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISJPNCCX, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPNCCX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISJPNCCX, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPBMNMHDK' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISJPBMNMHDK, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPBMNMHDK' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISJPBMNMHDK, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPNREX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISJPNREX, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPNREX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISJPNREX, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPNSX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISJPNSX, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPNSX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISJPNSX, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPNRAX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISJPNRAX, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISJPNRAX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISJPNRAX, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPWG' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPWG, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPWG' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPWG, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPNCCX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPNCCX, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPNCCX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPNCCX, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPJMXDYSY' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPJMXDYSY, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPJMXDYSY' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPJMXDYSY, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPJMXDESY' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPJMXDESY, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPJMXDESY' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPJMXDESY, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPTDQD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPTDQD, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPTDQD' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPTDQD, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPNXDX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPNXDX, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPNXDX' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPNXDX, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPGZ' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPGZ, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPGZ' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPGZ, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPCL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPCL, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPCL' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPCL, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPJHBS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPJHBS, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPJHBS' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPJHBS, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPBZSJH' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPBZSJH, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPBZSJH' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPBZSJH, (SELECT sum(PassSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPSYSC' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS pJISWCPSYSC, (SELECT SUM(HasCheckSum) FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE FromPC = 'JISWCPSYSC' AND InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXOId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#) AS qJISWCPSYSC FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail
SELECT * FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE InvoiceCusXOId = #InvoiceCusXoId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#

SELECT * FROM PCExportReportANSIDetail WHERE 1 = 1 AND CheckDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# AND (InvoiceCusXOId = #CusInvoiceXOId# OR #CusInvoiceXOId# IS NULL ) AND (ProductId = #productId# OR #productId# IS NULL) AND (FromPC = #pcExpType# OR #pcExpType# IS NULL)
